request.description: Send a message in a conversation

response.name: Greeting
Update Profile
search by adjective/condition
search by product and budget
search by category and budget
Create Order
Provide shipping address
Create order (out of stock)
search by product and availability
Check Order Status
Cancel Order
End Conversation
